nodes.text: The A-R6 was a model of speeder bike produced by Adno during the Cold War and Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. A variation on the standard type of speeder bike produced by Adno at the time, the A-R6 was primarily white with red highlights and stripes.
The Adno A-R6 was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Club Vertica Nightlife Pack in Game Update 2.8.
